data.message:
Thanks for letting me log on again.  Now I  am having problems commenting on posts.  Keep getting "..Action Blocked
You're temporarily restricted from joining and posting to groups until July 16 at 2:32am.
If you think you're seeing this by mistake, please let us know.."
Why am I getting that?

replies.message: Hi, Tom. It sounds like you may have over-used a feature, even if you didn't mean to. Hold tight until you can access the feature again. In the meantime, you can learn more about our policies by reviewing the Facebook Community Standards: http://bit.ly/29olnbJ. -Ali
